EmailTemplate.description: Needs financial statements and physical address verification
EmailTemplate.name: Chevron Credit FS and PAV
EmailTemplate.subject: Chevron and Texaco Business Card Program - Additional Information Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing the Chevron and Texaco Business Card Program.
In order to process your application, Credit is requesting a copy of your financial statements. You will need to send one full year of financial records, including your balance sheet and income statement.
Also, to comply with the Patriot Act, our bank needs you to verify your physical address for approval. Please provide documentation from a third party to verify your business is located at the correct address listed on your application.
To pass verification, the bank requires a copy of one of the following documents:
A copy of a Utility bill or invoice (i.e. telephone or power) showing that the bill is mailed to the physical street address or that it services the physical address of the business
Lease agreement that identifies the business and the physical street address of the business
Certified articles of incorporation that identifies the physical street address
An unexpired government-issued business license; a partnership agreement; or a trust instrument that identifies the physical street address
A copy of an invoice (paper supplies, lumber, etc.) that documents delivery to the physical street address as it appears on the credit application
Bank account statement that identifies the physical street address
Business name needs to match the name on the application and documents need to be no older than 60 days.
Feel free to scan and email the verification to me at the email address noted below, or if you prefer, you can fax it to me at {!User.Fax}. You can also call me at {!User.Phone} if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone}
Fax - {!User.Fax}
{!User.Email}
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of WEX Inc. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
WEX Inc., 97 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106 This is an advertisement from WEX Inc. If you no longer wish to receive future email advertisements from {!User.Email}, email us to unsubscribe. Please be sure to include your name, company name and email address in the email.
